block.p: Corrina Indigo Birnbaum, the daughter of Dale Hansen Saul of Chevy Chase, Md., and Michael Birnbaum of Plainfield, Vt., was married yesterday to Paul Douglas Gitterman, a son of Joanna Morris Gitterman and Joseph L. Gitterman III of Washington Depot, Conn. Justice Marilyn S. Skoglund of the Vermont State Supreme Court officiated at the Lake House in Grand Isle, Vt.

Mrs. Gitterman, 28, graduated from Regis College in Denver and received a master's degree in clinical social work last week from Smith College. Her father is a letter carrier for the Postal Service in Barre, Vt. Her mother is the clinical director of Healthy Families, a mental health service in Gaithersburg, Md.

Corrina Indigo Birnbaum, the daughter of Dale Hansen Saul of Chevy Chase, Md., and Michael Birnbaum of Plainfield, Vt., was married yesterday to Paul Douglas Gitterman, a son of Joanna Morris Gitterman and Joseph L. Gitterman III of Washington Depot, Conn. Justice Marilyn S. Skoglund of the Vermont State Supreme Court officiated at the Lake House in Grand Isle, Vt.

Mrs. Gitterman, 28, graduated from Regis College in Denver and received a master's degree in clinical social work last week from Smith College. Her father is a letter carrier for the Postal Service in Barre, Vt. Her mother is the clinical director of Healthy Families, a mental health service in Gaithersburg, Md.

Mr. Gitterman, 32, is a psychotherapist in Boulder, Colo., and a staff psychotherapist at the Mental Health Center of Boulder County and Longmont United Hospital in Longmont, Colo. He graduated from Skidmore College and received master's degrees in social work from Smith and in psychoanalytical developmental psychology from University College in London.

His mother is a reading tutor for first-grade students at Washington Lower School in Washington Depot. His father, a financial consultant in Washington Depot, retired as a senior managing director of La Branche & Company, a securities brokerage and specialist firm in New York; he was also a floor governor of the New York Stock Exchange.
